message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering our product! We're excited to discuss the details with you. We're willing to offer you the product at a price of $11,000. We believe this is a fair price considering the value it brings to your business.

Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $11,000 is a bit higher than I'd like to go right now. I'm willing to pay $10,500.  This is a fair price considering the value it brings to my business.  Let's see if we can make this work.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. We appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, we're not willing to go as low as $10,500. We're willing to meet you halfway and offer the product at $10,800. We believe this is a fair price considering the value it brings to your business.
